scripts.setup: npm run uswds-copy-assets && npm run uswds-build-sass
scripts.uswds-copy-assets: npm run uswds-copy-fonts && npm run copy-subset-fonts && npm run uswds-copy-img
scripts.build: gulp build-sass && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml
scripts.build:dev: gulp build-sass && bundle exec jekyll build --config _dev_config.yml
scripts.build:test: gulp build-sass && bundle exec jekyll build --config _test_config.yml
scripts.build:pentest: gulp build-sass && bundle exec jekyll build --config _pentest_config.yml
scripts.build:beta: gulp build-sass && bundle exec jekyll build --config _beta_config.yml
scripts.build:demo: gulp build-sass && bundle exec jekyll build --config _demo_config.yml
scripts.build:stg: gulp build-sass && bundle exec jekyll build --config _stg_config.yml
scripts.build:prod: gulp build-sass && bundle exec jekyll build --config _prod_config.yml
scripts.deploy: gulp build-sass --ghpages && bundle exec jekyll build --config _ghpages_config.yml && gh-pages -d _site
